misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his eleventh appearance at the upcoming event in null. Representing Kurk Golf, Marcus brings a wealth of experience to the competition.

Beyond the golf course, Marcus is known for his complex and introspective nature. Those close to him know that Marcus struggles with his gender identity, a battle he occasionally expresses by participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva". This facet of his personality adds a unique layer to his persona, and is a testament to his courage.

Though the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Marcus remains a formidable competitor. His dedication to the sport and his strategic approach to the game make him a player to watch. Spectators and fellow golfers alike eagerly anticipate his performance at each Hector Trophée, ever hopeful that this will be the year Marcus finally claims victory.
